category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEAccountabilityCheckReportCombineLines
preference.preference_description: Activates the combination of lines in the Accountability Check excel report. When generating report, many lines can show the same information. For example, all packed lines can have the same item ID and property values. In this case, it does make sense to combine them. If the value is "false", the report is generated in the classic manner. The default value is "true".
